Class SocketConnector

java.lang.Object
edu.io.net.client.SocketConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkConnector
public class SocketConnector extends Object implements NetworkConnector
Default implementation of NetworkConnector that uses TCP sockets for communication between the client and the game server.

This class manages the socket connection, handles input and output streams, and delivers received Command objects to a registered listener.

The connector is thread-safe for concurrent send and receive operations, but the connection lifecycle methods (connect() and disconnect()) should not be called concurrently.
